title: (x) Spoon 'Kill The Moonlight' cover art - hand lettering {Geoff}
content:
Hi all,

This one’s been bugging me for quite some time. It’s quite possible it may just be a hand-rendered effort but I thought I’d ask just in case. The album was released in 2002 on Merge. I’m unsure of the designer behind it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012001915im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spoon.jpg)

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) Emerge 001 on book spine - FF DIN {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012001915/http:/typophile.com/node/19174 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Skin Party navigation type - FF Meta {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012001915/http:/typophile.com/node/19164 "Go to next forum topic")
author: baskervillain

comments.content: Definitely hand lettering, none of the characters match.
I believe the designer is [Aesthetic Apparatus](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012001915/http:/aestheticapparatus.com/). You could ask them.
